testsuite.name: 30 - I should NOT be able to restart a completed pipeline (pipeline details modal)

testcase.name: 30 - I should NOT be able to restart a completed pipeline (pipeline details modal) LM-30-1 Should find disabled restart pipeline button
testcase.classname: LM-30-1 Should find disabled restart pipeline button

testcase.name: 30 - I should NOT be able to restart a completed pipeline (pipeline details modal) LM-30-2 Should resubmit pipeline

failure.message:
cy.click() failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
<input type="checkbox" checked="">
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them.
The previous command that ran was:
> cy.find()
This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command.
Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element
You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands.
https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
